properties.description: Pisco is a producer of fine organic cotton, which is spun into the yarns that contribute to making Indigenous Designs’ fashion comfortable and good for the world.
properties.title: Pisco Green Farm

properties.description: Juana and her sister Lucia are co-founders of a local women’s knitting cooperative, Hermanas Tejiendo Grupo. The group has grown from 3 to 9 knitters in the past year.
properties.title: Juana Garzas

properties.description: Asociacion de Artisanas is a growing cooperative of 20 artisans hand weaving several items from Indigenous Designs’ Fall 2011 line of outerwear.
properties.title: Asociacion de Artisanas

properties.description: Jessica is a master knitter who founded her small business with help from Indigenous Designs and the ABC Fund for economic development.
properties.title: Jessica Rodriguez
Asociacion de Artisanas to Juana Garzas
